short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ask any question about the website you're looking at. Powered by Firecrawl and GPT-4o-mini.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ask Me Anything (AMA) is a powerful AI-driven Chrome extension that transforms the way you interact with websites. It allows you to ask questions and receive detailed answers about the content of any website you visit. 

How AMA works: It uses the Firecrawl API to perform a deep crawl of the website you are looking at (not just the current page). Then, it loads the crawled results into context for GPT-4o-mini, which then answers your questions.

Bring your own API keys for Firecrawl and OpenAI!
